title: 22. ENTIRE AGREEMENT
content: This Agreement represents the complete and final understanding between the Parties with respect to the subject matter herein and supersedes and replaces any and all prior or contemporaneous agreements, understandings, negotiations, or representations, whether oral or written, relating to the subject matter of this Agreement.
No other terms, conditions, representations, or warranties shall be binding unless expressly agreed to in writing and signed by authorized representatives of both Parties.
